ygData.subject: Profanity & Spam - Please notify me
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, Apparently on one of my lists (EQ-Druids@onelist.com), there was excessive spam/profanity by someone. I wish I had the time to monitor closely all 17
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

Apparently on one of my lists (EQ-Druids@onelist.com), there was excessive
spam/profanity by someone. I wish I had the time to monitor closely all 17
lists I manage... well I dont. If I find a violation in the archives (yes
EVERYthing is recorded), I will handle it. It would help me immensely if
someone would report these violations to me when they occur. You can use
either the email address or the EQ-****-owner@onelist.com address; either
way I get the mail (**** = whatever list the problem is occuring on). If ANY
profanity is used action on my part will be taken. First, you get a
warning.. second time.. you're gone. Thank you, and I do my best to stay on
top of these things.


* David Abdemoulaie
* mailto:DAcash18@...
* ICQ - 21360590
